name: Authority
resistance: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.desc: The Authority’s weapon attacks are magical. When the Authority hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 9 (2d8) radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The Authority has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects from evil characters and sources.

traits.name: Aura of Protection Against Evil
traits.desc: Evil creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against all allies within 5 feet of the Authority. Allies in this area can’t be charmed, frightened, or possessed by evil creatures. If an ally is already charmed, frightened, or possessed by evil magic, the ally has advantage on any new saving throw against the relevant effect.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Authority makes three attacks with the Brightsword.

actions.name: Brightsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage and 9 (2d8) radiant damage. Evil creatures take an extra 9 (2d8) radiant damage.
